norgeo 1.3.2
  • Reference

Read raw CSV files from SSB to R object

Source: R/file_setup.R
read_ssb.Rd

Read all CSV files in the folder specified. The objects can be available in the .GlobalEnv if argument global = TRUE. Important! Any existing objects of similar names will be replaced without warning. The object name will be something like "kommune_01" if kommune is specified in the type argument.

read_ssb(
  folder.path,
  type = NULL,
  sep = c(";", "."),
  encoding = NULL,
  global = FALSE
)

Arguments

folder.path

Folder path to the files
type

Type of regional granularity ie. fylke, kommune etc.
sep

The separate symbols in the CSV file. Use ".." if lazy to check
encoding

Select the suitable encoding
global

If TRUE the objects will be available globally
